![https://www.eib.org/en/projects/all/20230066](SKELLETEAE-AFFORDABLE-HOUSING.png)

European Investment Bank (EIB) to finance construction of 743 affordable housing units, including a specific housing programme for students in Skellefteå. 2023-09-14.

The aim of the operation is to contribute to urban development and regeneration, and address strong demand for housing in the Municipality of Skellefteå, where the waiting list reaches 46,000 applicants.
